titleInfo.title: D. H. Holmes Building, Mardi Gras

subject.topic: D. H. Holmes Building (New Orleans, La.)

mods.abstract: The camera stands at street level across from and at a slight angle to the D. H. Holmes Building. The facade has been decorated with many lights for Madri Gras. The photographer captured this image at night.

titleInfo.title: New Orleans Negative Exposures and Prints, circa 1900-1930

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
